description.narrative: Education authorities have increased capacity in evidence based national and decentralised sector analysis, planning, coordination, and management., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: EDUCATION outcome: Girls and boys of school age especially vulnerable children in deprived provinces and areas, access primary education that is progressively child friendly and demonstrates improved learning outcomes.

participating-org.narrative: DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION GHOR GHOR PROVINCE

Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education authorities have increased capacity in evidence based national and decentralised sector analysis, planning, coordination, and management.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported Ministry of Education with elaborating and endorsing national education COVID-19 response plan, ensuring students' continued engagement in learning during lockdown. Supporting girls' education, UNICEF conducted social mobilization training assessment, evaluating the impact of social mobilization on behavioral change related to girls' access to school. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:27/07/2020

title.narrative: Number of Provincial gender responsive operational plans budgeted and implemented
System Strengthening - Education sector planning - National strategies address inequities in education resource allocation - score (1-4), see guidance
Share of DPs in education which align their support with NESP-III and annual operational plan

Existence of effective and well-structured coordination platforms for policy dialogue, advocacy and synergy among education stakeholders (government, donors, development partners, civil society and others) at national and sub-national levels

baseline.value: Initiating (Score 2): Regular coordination meetings are held and requires strengthening at national and decentralised level
